statements: DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp < '2023-01-01' AND action = 'Login'
DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE user_id = 100 AND compliance_type = 'HIPAA';
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND user_id = 5;

DELETE FROM compliance_records WHERE category = 'Data Protection';
DELETE FROM user_records WHERE is_approved = TRUE AND record_date < '2022-01-01';
